name: Vrcade Playroom
description:
Vrcade Playroom is an Online Multiplayer VR game where you can bowl, play air hockey and arcade basketball with up to 4 friends.

Note: You will need any VR headset to play this game

Start your game and enter the room. Check the bowling lane to show your abilities throwing the bowling pins, try the basketball arcade machine and get the highscore or meet a friend to play air hockey together.

How to play?

Use grab button in your hand control to grab any object in the scene. Also, you can use your hands to push buttons.

Press the right trigger button to teleport yourself to a new location.

Also you can use the custom Run in Place method implemented to move around over the scene. You just need to run in place as you would do in the real world!
